comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Flickr Commons, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 16669233@N06
comment._content: in 1915 a SS Strathgarry collided and sank in Scapa Flow, Orkney, UK. Wreck still on bottom and visited by divers.
